title: The Week of Resolve: The Tale of Jin Coleman
summary: Jin Coleman, a persuasive and pious superhero, battles a mysterious force threatening his city, using the power of words and faith to restore peace.
summaryGerman: Jin Coleman, ein überzeugender und frommer Superheld, bekämpft eine mysteriöse Kraft, die seine Stadt bedroht, indem er die Macht der Worte und des Glaubens nutzt, um den Frieden wiederherzustellen.
summaryDutch: Jin Coleman, een overtuigende en vrome superheld, vecht tegen een mysterieuze kracht die zijn stad bedreigt, door de kracht van woorden en geloof te gebruiken om de vrede te herstellen.
summaryFrench: Jin Coleman, un super-héros persuasif et pieux, combat une force mystérieuse menaçant sa ville, utilisant le pouvoir des mots et de la foi pour rétablir la paix.

story.text: Jin Coleman starts his week with a deep sense of peace, as usual, dedicating his morning to prayer. But peace is disrupted when he hears of a dark cloud looming over his city.
The cloud begins affecting the townspeople, instilling fear and despair. Jin uses his persuasive power to uplift and instill courage in his community.
Jin's efforts seem to hold the dark forces at bay temporarily. He feels triumphant as the town's morale boosts, but the threat still lurks.
The situation intensifies as the dark force reveals itself as a malevolent entity feeding off the city's fear. Jin's mood turns somber as he prepares for a confrontation.
With his city's fate hanging in the balance, Jin spends his day in prayer and planning, drawing strength from his faith to face the powerful foe.
The showdown begins. Jin confronts the entity, using his powerful words to expose the truth behind the fear it spreads, weakening it with light and faith.
As the new week dawns, the city celebrates its newfound peace, with Jin leading a communal prayer of thanks. The tranquility of life seems restored.

moral: The combined power of faith and persuasive words can conquer even the darkest threats.
